DOC.brief_summary: In study , 18-week , single-blinded , randomize control clinical trial conduct evaluate effectiveness , efficacy safety acupuncture weight control Hong Kong .
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot single-blind , randomize , sham-controlled trial . 72 participant randomly assign acupuncture group control group . The duration treatment 8 week 2 session per week follow-up period 8 week .
DOC.criteria: age 18 65 year old ; body mass index ( BMI ) â‰¥25 kg/m2 ; receive weight control measure medical and/or drug history within last 3 month . endocrine diseases ; heart diseases ; patient pacemaker ; allergy immunology disease ; bleed tendency ; pregnant lactating woman ; impair hepatic renal function ; stroke otherwise unable exercise .
